participant_1.background:
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
i like ford cars.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler.

participant_2.background:
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
i am very health conscious , and i watch what i eat.
I'm constantly daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: I was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage last night, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I'm a singer-songwriter. I play acoustic guitar and sing. I love playing old country music and classic rock.
That's so cool! I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
Oh, nice! I like Ford cars. I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.

That's really cool! I'm very health conscious and I watch what I eat. I'm constantly daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing. I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.
That's a nice way to live. I do enjoy going to concerts, but I also like to stay home and relax. What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to a concert or just hang out at home. What about you?
I'm not sure either. I might go to a car show or just stay home and relax.
